title: Onboarding policy management
subtitle: Onboarding policy will allow to define criterias to onboard data

premium.title: Premium content
premium.subtitle: Creating custom onboarding group or the import/export feature are accessible only to clients with enterprise offers

error.onUpdatePolicySettings: Unable to save policy settings. Try later or reach out to CIDgravity team
error.onDeletePolicyGroup: Unable to delete policy group. Try later or reach out to CIDgravity team
error.onImportPolicy: Unable to import onboarding policy. Try later or each out to CIDgravity team
error.PROVIDER_BLACKLISTED: One provider is currently blacklisted. Remove it from blacklist before adding to a policy group
error.NUMBER_OF_GROUP_LIMIT_EXCEEDED: You can't import more than 10 policy group
error.GROUP_MUST_CONTAINS_AT_LEAST_ONE_PROVIDE: Import error: a group must contain at least one provider
error.GROUP_NAME_MUST_BE_UNIQUE: Import error: group name must be unique
error.PROVIDER_DUPLICATED_IN_OTHER_GROUP: Import error: provider can only be in one group at a time
error.NUMBER_OF_COPIES_GREATER_THAN_PROVIDERS: Import error: number of copies can't be greater can number of providers
error.GROUP_NAME_ALREADY_USED: Import error: group name is already used
error.PROVIDER_ALREADY_USED: Import error: provider is already in another existing group
error.INVALID_PROVIDER_ADDRESS: Import error: one provider address is invalid
error.NOT_SHORT_ADDRESS: Import error: one provider address is not a short address
error.NOT_FOUND_ON_CHAIN: Import error: one provider address doesn't exist on chain
error.GROUP_NAME_CONTAINS_RESERVED_WORD_MIX: Reserved word "Mix" is not allowed in group name

initOnboardingPolicy.title: You must configure your onboarding policy settings before using this feature.

error.generic: Unable to load policy groups. Try later or reach out to CIDgravity team.
